food.question: I am yellow and yummy. Monkeys like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 😋 You peel me to eat me.

food.question: I am round and red. I grow on a tree. What am I?
I am long and orange. Bunnies love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐰 Bugs Bunny eats me all the time!

food.question: I am white and cold. You eat me with a spoon. What am I?

hints.text: 🥶 I am kept in the freezer.
🥄 You can add sprinkles on me!

food.question: I am small and green. I grow in a pod. What am I?

hints.text: 🟢 I am the color of grass.
🍚 Sometimes I am served with rice.

food.question: I am white or brown. You can make bread with me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍚 I am used to make noodles too.

food.question: I am yellow and you can spread me on bread. Cows make the milk to make me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐄 Milk is needed to create me.
🍳 You can cook eggs with me.

food.question: I am a fruit that is long and purple. Monkeys love to eat me, even though I am not yellow like the Banana. What am I?

hints.text: 💜 I am the color of a grape.
🌳 I grow on trees in warmer climates.

food.question: I am small and round. I am red or green. I grow in bunches. What am I?

hints.text: 🍇 You can eat a lot of me at once!
🍷 People make juice out of me.

food.question: I am a liquid that is white. Baby cows drink me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 You can pour me in a glass.
🥣 You can put me on cereal.

cosmos.question: I am big and bright, and I shine in the day. What am I?

hints.text: 😎 You need sunglasses to look at me!

cosmos.question: I am round and you live on me. What am I?
I come out at night and I am round and white. What am I?

hints.text: 🌚 I glow in the dark sky.
🧀 People sometimes say I am made of this food.

cosmos.question: I am far away and twinkle at night. What am I?

hints.text: 🔭 You need this to see me closer.

cosmos.question: Sometimes I block the sun and make it dark during the day. What am I?

hints.text: 🐑 I can look like a sheep.

cosmos.question: I am a big, round group of stars. What am I?

hints.text: 🌌 Our sun is part of me.
🥛 Some people call me the Milky Way

cosmos.question: I fly high up in space. Sometimes people are inside me. What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 I can go to the moon!
👩‍🔬 I am big and white and fly very fast.

cosmos.question: I am hot and made of fire and gases, and I am in the center of our solar system. What am I?
I'm a giant ball of frozen dirt and ice that has a tail when I get close to the sun. What am I?

hints.text: ☄️ I have a shiny tail in the night sky.
🧊 I am made of ice and dust.
✨ I am a type of space rock.

cosmos.question: I am smaller than the Earth and go around the sun. I am red and rocky. What am I?

hints.text: 🔴 I am named after a Roman god of war.
🚀 People may visit me one day.
